item.title: Moving from MacOS to Asahi Linux
item.description: Moving from MacOS to Asahi Linux Status Hardware Audio Jack: ✅ Bluetooth: ✅ Camera: ❌ Fingerprint: ❌ HDMI: ❌ Speakers: ❌ Touchpad: ✅ Wi-Fi: ✅ Software Obsidian: ✅ RVM: ⚠ (rvm is installed but ruby build fails) Slack: ❌ Telegram: ✅ Zoom: ❌ Functionality Brightness Control: ✅ Hibernate: ❌ Suspend to RAM: ⚠ (OS is being suspended but laptop is keep working and draining battery)
